title: Klingon language pack
description:
The Klingon language is the constructed language spoken by the Klingons in the Star Trek universe.

 
For many years, Klingons have been the premier warriors in the galaxy. Regarded across known space with fear and awe, few beings understand the true depth and greatness of the Klingon culture.
"Four thousand throats may be cut in one night by a running man." -- Klingon proverb

Files:
* The Sounds of Klingon
* Orthography
* Everyday Klingon Phrases
* The Klingon Dictionary
* Klingon Words Not in The Klingon Dictionary

Audiobooks:
* Conversational Klingon (XXVII A.S.)
* Power Klingon (XXVIII A.S.)
* The Klingon Way (XXXI A.S.)

See also
* Google in Klingon: https://www.google.com/?hl=xx-klingon
* 'u' is the first opera in the Klingon language, billed as "The first authentic Klingon opera on Earth". Official website: http://www.u-theopera.org/
